question: I would assassinate an evil ruler if...

options.text: They destroyed our knowledge and brought a dark age upon us.
We are starving and cannot eat.
They have hurt those that I love dearly.
They have committed crimes and justice must be served.
We cannot leave and are slaves to this land.
Doing so would allow us to recover and rebuild.

question: I would not assassinate an evil ruler if killing them would...

options.text: Bring about a dark age of ignorance, poverty, and famine.
Only bring violent backlash and revenge that solves nothing.
Cause the death of all those I care about.
Be a lawless act that destroys the people's faith in justice.
Mean that you alone had to clean up the mess and govern through the aftermath.
Only cause another evil to rise to power.

question: You are the ruler of a land that has seen a prosperous harvest. You can only do one:

options.text: Trade the excess harvest to research new technology.
Save the excess harvest for a potential, future famine.

question: You are the ruler of a land. Your government is:

options.text: A democracy. You let the people discuss what they need in an open forum before coming to you. You will do what they ask to the best of your ability.
A republic. Sometimes you know better and will decide what is best, even if your subjects carefully deliberate before asking you.

question: You are the ruler of a land. You are faced with a difficult strategic problem:

options.text: You can't anticipate everything.
The devil is in the details.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: If something isn't broken, don't fix it.
Nothing is perfect.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Don't reinvent the wheel.
Every failure is a lesson learned.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Gambling is a waste. The house always wins.
You have to take risks if you want rewards.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Quality of life was better when things were simpler.
Quality of life has generally gotten better through time.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Passive profit is a good investment.
The world would be better if all work was automated.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Waste is rarely considered but critically important.
You need to break an egg to make an omelette.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: The best ideas are tried and true.
The best ideas are still undiscovered.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: You can really feel the mood of others around you.
Sometimes your intensity makes enemies out of strangers.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: It is good to thank others if they help you.
If someone is doing something wrong, they should know about it.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Persuasion is powerful.
Coercion is powerful.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: I can easily code switch in different environments.
I try to be the same person with the same goals.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Healing is more important than punishment.
I am driven towards something (objectivity, faith, truth, knowledge, goals).

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Decisions that impact others should involve their input.
To each their own.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: It is important that guests feel comfortable.
It is important that others know your point of view.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: You like it when someone else suggests things to do.
You like to make to-do lists, even if you don't get everything done.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: You like to go with the flow.
You find peace when there is closure.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: You like to start new things.
You like to finish things you start.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Too much strategy is a waste of time.
A strategy is still good to have up front, even if things change.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Opportunities are everywhere if you just look closely.
Learning how to navigate systems and structures can set you free.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Mobility is the greatest privilege.
Litigiousness is the greatest privilege.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: I fear being trapped.
I fear getting lost.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Magic has great potential.
Magic is not trustworthy.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: I seek glory
I seek contentment

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Help the ones you love.
Do what you believe you must.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: I don't like being alone.
I don't like being wrong.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: An unexpected reward is most satisfying.
An earned reward is most satisfying.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Opportunity is the key to success.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Change comes from within oneself.
Change comes from new experience.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Giving unwanted criticism can cause problems.
Apologizing too much can cause problems.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: I fear being tied down.
I fear having no future.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: I want others to feel understood and validated.
I want bad people to stop being bad.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: I try to meet people halfway.
I am not afraid to stand up and speak out.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: It is smarter to take initiative.
It is smarter to be thorough.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Sitting still drives me insane.
Having unfinished projects drives me insane.

question: Rate how much you agree with these statements:

options.text: Valuable resources should be shared with those who need them.
